attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bankers should be prohibited from claiming bonuses for doing their jobs so badly, that our country has dropped to the state that it is in.  Bonuses should not be part of salary packages but like every other business be part and parcel of meeting fair and provable good practise and management targets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
